Description.SetDescription: IMPORTANT: Defines which preset the application will start.

Description.BlockDescription: If there is something on the block list, if the software identifies any of the URLs being executed, it will block the process of playing that URL.

Description.EnabledOption: If enabled, checks the integrity of the structure of folders and files.

Description.EnabledDescription: If enabled, start the log system.
Description.CompactFolderDescription: If enabled next to the Logger.Enabled option, the log system will compress the folders that will no longer be used.

Description.EnabledDescription: If enabled, the software's internal engine will be used, it is recommended to use any browser based on Chromium.
Description.PathDescription: The path to the binary engine.
Description.DevModeDescription: If enabled and a key is configured, this key will launch the engine's developer mode.
Description.ArgumentsDescription: The arguments that will be passed to the engine.

Description.EnabledDescription: If enabled, the software will automatically check for updates at startup.
If enabled, the software will automatically check for driver updates at startup.
If enabled, the software will clean all processes not terminated at startup.
If enabled and a key is configured, that key will terminate the software correctly.
